title: US Senate GENIUS Stablecoin Bill Final Vote Set for Tuesday
summary: The US Senate is set for a final vote on the GENIUS Act next Tuesday, requiring stablecoins to be fully backed by USD or liquid assets with mandatory annual audits for issuers above $50B market cap. After Senate approval, the bill must be reconciled with the House's STABLE Act, addressing differences in state vs federal regulation and foreign issuer oversight.

title: Ark Invest Sells $51.7M of Circle Shares at All-Time High
summary: Ark Invest sold $51.7 million worth of Circle shares as the company hit an all-time high valuation. This significant divestment by a major institutional investor could signal profit-taking or portfolio rebalancing in the stablecoin sector.

title: Tether Blocks $12.3M USDT Tied to Suspicious Tron Addresses
summary: Tether has frozen $12.3 million in USDT linked to suspicious addresses on the Tron network. This action demonstrates Tether's ongoing compliance efforts and ability to freeze funds associated with potential illicit activities.

title: Founders Fund Invests in Ex-Citi Banker's Stablecoin Startup
summary: Peter Thiel's Founders Fund has invested in a stablecoin startup founded by a former Citibank executive. This investment signals continued institutional interest in stablecoin infrastructure despite regulatory uncertainty.

title: Coinbase and Gemini Near EU Crypto License Approvals Under MiCA
summary: Major US exchanges Coinbase and Gemini are close to receiving crypto license approvals in the EU under the Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) regulation. This would allow them to offer compliant stablecoin services across European markets.

title: Palmer Luckey Plans Crypto-Friendly Bank Called Erebor
summary: Oculus founder Palmer Luckey aims to revive tech banking with a new crypto and stablecoin-friendly bank called Erebor. This initiative could provide crucial banking infrastructure for crypto companies struggling with traditional banking relationships.

title: Contango Offers Up to 29.47% APY on Leveraged USDC Strategies
summary: Contango enables users to leverage various collateral types including PT-syrupUSDC and slvlUSD, borrowing USDC up to 9.27x to maximize yields between 8.27% to 29.47%. The platform offers additional Contango Points and Lent Points multipliers for users.

title: YieldFi yUSD Offers 11.74% APY with Multi-Protocol Points
summary: YieldFi's yUSD token provides 11.74% APY by allowing users to deposit various stablecoins and Pendle's PT tokens. Users earn additional points from TAC, Sonic, Napier, and Resolv protocols with 0% minting and redemption fees.
